LocaleResource.Name: NopAdvance.Plugin.AdminLayoutChanger.Admin.Info
LocaleResource.Value: Note: Application will restart on configuration change for "Enabled", "Use responsive menu" and "Use tabs" settings.

LocaleResource.Name: NopAdvance.Plugin.AdminLayoutChanger.Admin.Configure.Fields.Enabled.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Check/Uncheck to enable/disable plugin. Note: This will restart application on save.

LocaleResource.Name: NopAdvance.Plugin.AdminLayoutChanger.Admin.Configure.Fields.LabelPositionId.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Please choose the form label's position to be displayed on.

LocaleResource.Name: NopAdvance.Plugin.AdminLayoutChanger.Admin.Configure.Fields.MiniLogoId.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Admin mini Logo. This displays mini logo on top-left corner of website when side menu is slided left.

LocaleResource.Name: NopAdvance.Plugin.AdminLayoutChanger.Admin.Configure.Fields.MiniLogoId.Info
LocaleResource.Value: Image dimensions 50px x 50px (Width x Height). In case of top menu in desktop, mini logo will display on mobile or tablate.

LocaleResource.Name: NopAdvance.Plugin.AdminLayoutChanger.Admin.Configure.Fields.LargeLogoId.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Admin large Logo. This displays logo on top-left corner of admin website.

LocaleResource.Name: NopAdvance.Plugin.AdminLayoutChanger.Admin.Configure.Fields.UseResponsiveMenu.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Enable this to use top menu in desktop. On mobile device, it will get back to left side menu. Note: This will restart application on save.

LocaleResource.Name: NopAdvance.Plugin.AdminLayoutChanger.Admin.Configure.Fields.UseTabs.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Use tabs instead of panel on edit and configuration pages. Note: This will restart application on save.

LocaleResource.Name: NopAdvance.Plugin.AdminLayoutChanger.Admin.Configure.Fields.TabLayout.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Choose from vertical or horizontal tab layout.

LocaleResource.Name: NopAdvance.Plugin.AdminLayoutChanger.Admin.Configure.Fields.AdminTheme.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Choose best available theme color for your nopCommerce admin.

LocaleResource.Name: NopAdvance.Plugin.AdminLayoutChanger.Admin.Configure.Fields.RemoveCopyRightFooter.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Check to remove admin copyright from footer.

LocaleResource.Name: NopAdvance.Plugin.AdminLayoutChanger.Admin.UsePreDefineTheme.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Select if you want to use pre define theme, if you want to use custom color selection then dont select it.

LocaleResource.Name: NopAdvance.Plugin.AdminLayoutChanger.Admin.Configure.Fields.Published.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Check to enable admin layout changer settings for selected customer role.
